overview: Get ready for the wiggliest show on earth! Be dazzled by Dorothy dancing en Pointe! Watch amazing Anthony do the splits! Marvel at Murray's musical masterpiece! Swoon to Sam's singing spectacular and enjoy Jeff jumping before your eyes. See The Wiggles singing some of their best-loved tunes - filmed live at the Sydney Entertainment Center December of 2008.
title: The Wiggles - Big, Big Show!
